summary: Completed testing of SDC Detail page redesign. 9/10 features verified working correctly. The Update button on Process Stages section exists but the dialog is not implemented (missing Dialog component).

ui_bugs.issue: Update button sets showStageUpdateDialog state but no Dialog component exists to handle it

passed_tests: 1. SDC Detail page loads correctly - PASSED
2. SDC Summary card shows target students (60), work orders count (3), location (Jaipur), status (Active) - PASSED
3. Overall Progress card shows percentage (20%) and mini timeline (1-2-3-4-5 steps) - PASSED
4. Financial summary shows 5 cards (Total Contract, Total Billed, Collected, Outstanding, Variance) - PASSED
5. Process Stages section shows 5 stages with progress bars (NO duplicacy - appears only once) - PASSED
6. Deliverables section shows 4 items (Dress Distribution, Study Material, ID Card, Tool Kit) in separate box on right side - PASSED
7. Work Orders tab shows work orders table - PASSED
9. Update button on Process Stages section - EXISTS but dialog not implemented
10. No duplicate Process Flow tab in tabs - PASSED (only Work Orders and Billing tabs visible)
action_items: Add Dialog component for showStageUpdateDialog state to make Update button functional (LOW priority - button exists but dialog is missing)
critical_code_review_comments: SDC Detail page redesign successfully removes duplicacy - Process Stages now appears only in main content area, not in tabs
Layout is clean with 2/3 + 1/3 split for Process Stages and Deliverables
Mini timeline in Overall Progress card provides good visual representation of 5 stages
Financial summary cards are well organized in a 5-column grid
showStageUpdateDialog state is defined but no corresponding Dialog component exists (line 115 and 401)
seed_data_creation: None - used existing SDC (sdc_jaipur) with target_students: 60
context_for_next_testing_agent: SDC Detail page redesign is complete. The page now shows: 1) SDC Summary card with target students, work orders, location, status, 2) Overall Progress card with percentage and mini timeline, 3) Financial summary with 5 cards, 4) Process Stages and Deliverables side by side (2/3 + 1/3 layout), 5) Only Work Orders and Billing tabs (no duplicate Process Flow tab). The Update button on Process Stages exists but the dialog is not implemented - this is a minor issue.

feature_verification.sdc_summary_card: VERIFIED - Shows Target Students (60), Work Orders (3), Location (Jaipur), Status (Active)
feature_verification.overall_progress_card: VERIFIED - Shows 20% with mini timeline (1-2-3-4-5 steps)
feature_verification.financial_summary_5_cards: VERIFIED - Total Contract, Total Billed, Collected, Outstanding, Variance
feature_verification.process_stages_no_duplicacy: VERIFIED - Appears only once in main content area
feature_verification.deliverables_section: VERIFIED - 4 items (Dress Distribution, Study Material, ID Card, Tool Kit) on right side
feature_verification.update_button: PARTIAL - Button exists but dialog not implemented
feature_verification.no_duplicate_process_flow_tab: VERIFIED - Only Work Orders and Billing tabs visible
